com.turing123.robotframe.function

Interface IFunction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IASRFunction, IAssembleOutputFunction, IBodyStateFunction, IExpressionFunction, IIOTFunction, IKeyInputFunction, IMotorFunction, ISelfProtectFunction, ITTSFunction, IWakeUpFunction

    public interface IFunction
    All function on robot must inherit this interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void choiceProcessor(int processor)
      Maybe, a function has more than one processor, Call this function to choice processor that will be process function call.
      int getFunctionType() 
      FunctionState getState()
      return the function state.
      void onFunctionInterrupted()
      will be called when this Function being interrupted
      void onFunctionLoad()
      will be called when the Function being added into robot
      void onFunctionUnload()
      will be called when the Function being removed from robot
      void resetFunction()
      Reset function to initial state.
      void setStateObserver(IFunctionStateObserver observer)
      set a state observer for function.

    • Method Detail

      • onFunctionLoad

        void onFunctionLoad()
        will be called when the Function being added into robot

      • onFunctionUnload

        void onFunctionUnload()
        will be called when the Function being removed from robot

      • onFunctionInterrupted

        void onFunctionInterrupted()
        will be called when this Function being interrupted

      • getFunctionType

        int getFunctionType()
        Returns:
        the function type. the type must be in valid range

      • choiceProcessor

        void choiceProcessor(int processor)
        Maybe, a function has more than one processor, Call this function to choice processor that will be process function call. The default function supports the processor type to see the function interface define.
        Parameters:
        processor - processor type value.

      • resetFunction

        void resetFunction()
        Reset function to initial state.

      • getState

        FunctionState getState()
        return the function state.
        Returns:
        functionState
        See Also:
        FunctionState

      • setStateObserver

        void setStateObserver(IFunctionStateObserver observer)
        set a state observer for function.
        Parameters:
        observer - IFunctionStateObserver
